attributes.action: Remove the sickening images from cigerette packaging.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People these days are more than aware that smoking can damage your health, but yet by law smokers have sickening images of lungs and other damaged organs imposed on them, and I hear that this policy may further be extended to alcohol.
This, almost threatening policy is not needed anymore and should be scrapped, if the government insists on this, then perhaps more dangerous items will be forced to follow suit. A mangled family paint scheme on all new cars?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
